title: Close encounters of the sexual kind (Captioned)
viewing_guidelines: CAPTIONED: suitable for hearing impaired viewers
subject_group: Food, Health, Lifestyle, Medicine, Psychology & Safety/Sexually transmitted diseases
Family, Gender Identity, Relationships & Sexuality/Sexually transmitted diseases
description: Sequel to "Contraception: ready or not" addressing myths, facts and attitudes towards sexually transmitted diseases. Designed to encourage a responsible attitude towards sex and contraception and the prevention of STD's. The issues raised include AIDS, the need for medical check-ups, communication and condoms.
